current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To ensure that holders of flood insurance policies under the National Flood Insurance Program do
			 not receive premium refunds for coverage of second homes.

header.#text: No refunds under National Flood Insurance Program for coverage of second homes

term.#tail: means the program established under the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
or any
			 other provision of law, in the case of flood insurance coverage under the
			 National Flood Insurance Program for a residential property that is not
			 the primary residence of an individual (as that term is used in
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 3(a)(4) of the Homeowner Flood Insurance Affordability Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Homeowner Flood Insurance Affordability Act of 2014/s:3/ss:a/p:4

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not refund any premium for such coverage
			 collected in excess of the rates required under the provisions of, and
			 amendments made by,
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Administrator of the Federal
			 Emergency Management Agency

section 3 of the Homeowner Flood Insurance
			 Affordability Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Homeowner Flood Insurance Affordability Act of 2014/s:3

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section
			 1307(a)(2)(A) of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968

header.#text: No refunds for coverage of second homes

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2137 ES: To ensure that holders of flood insurance policies under the National Flood Insurance Program do not receive premium refunds for coverage of second homes.
